value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oooh! You're here? Then the ritual
actually worked? Ahem...$k$pOh Great Hero from another world!
Thou hast come so far to fulfill
your role in our legend!$k$pFor our kingdom now stands on
the very brink of ruin, and thou...
And thou...$k$p$EFace_Anger|Hold on. Are you really our
Great Hero? You don't look like
the thee-and-thou type.$k$p$EFace_Pain|What's that? You want to know where
you are? And how you got here?
Fair enough. You're in—$k$p$WmMEID_アクスファイター,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$w0|FOUND YOU!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Drat! How did one of those Emblians
get here already? Stand back! I'll take
care of him somehow!$k$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Whew! We took care of him.$k$p$EFace_Smile|My name's Anna. I'm the commander
of the Order of Heroes.$k$p$EFace|We believe that Heroes should live
free. Our enemies, however, enslave
them—the fiends.$k$pThis realm has gateways to the worlds
where Heroes come from. Have you
heard of the World of Awakening?$k$pHow about the World of Birthright?
Or the World of Conquest? There
are so many more!$k$pThe Emblian Empire invades those
worlds and binds their Heroes to
service. We fight for their freedom!$k$p$EFace_Anger|That soldier was from the Emblian
Empire, which will soon invade our
neighboring kingdom Askr.$k$pI was desperate for help. I performed
a summoning ceremony. And you
just appeared out of nowhere.$k$p$EFace|Lucky us! But there's no time to rest.
We have to act fast if we're going to
save our kingdom!$k$Sbs150|

Move your allies around the map
and defeat your foes to win.

Drag your ally to move them. You
can move to any blue space.

Drag your ally over a foe to attack!
You can attack any red space.
